events.name: GDG Cloud Wroclaw: Intro
events.description:
... and action !!!
It’s first cloud beer talk meeting.
This is the perfect place to share experiences and ideas in a relaxed, enthusiastic, positive, open-minded & respectful environment.

Meeting will be focused for a people who want to be a part of group organizers and build cloud community in Wroclaw.

The group's activities are generally free and all - from newbies to managers - are welcome.

events.name: Cloud Study Jam
events.description:
Want to get started with the Google Cloud, but don't know where to begin?
Learn the fundamentals of the Google Cloud Platform with us!

During the workshops:

*We'll work through three Google Cloud Platform Essentials labs together, then you will get free access to the next quest so you can finish this series of labs at home to get a Google-hosted badge for your online profile.
*You will learn how to set up development and production environments in the Cloud.
*You will be able to get hands-on experience with Docker, Kubernetes and Scientific Data Processing, which will earn you additional badges.

Join this meetup to get official Google training, a $70+ value, free of charge.
Bring a laptop (PC, Mac or Chromebook)! The labs will run on all of the latest versions of the popular browsers. For the best experience, make sure your laptop has Firefox or Chrome installed.

Attendees get free access to the labs.
Due to limited space available, attendees need to register on this meetup event. Click that you are coming!

events.name: Girls Go Cloud - Cloud Study Jam
events.description:
Want to get started with the Google Cloud, but don't know where to begin?
Learn the fundamentals of the Google Cloud Platform with us and ASI!

Girls Go Cloud is a special edition of Cloud Study Jam - we want to engage more women in this area of technology but of course, everyone is welcome to come regardless of their gender

During the workshops:

*We'll work through three Google Cloud Platform Essentials labs together, then you will get free access to the next quest so you can finish this series of labs at home to get a Google-hosted badge for your online profile.
*You will learn how to set up development and production environments in the Cloud.
*You will be able to get hands-on experience with Docker, Kubernetes and Scientific Data Processing, which will earn you additional badges.

Join this meetup to get official Google training, a $70+ value, free of charge.
Bring a laptop (PC, Mac or Chromebook)! The labs will run on all of the latest versions of the popular browsers. For the best experience, make sure your laptop has Firefox or Chrome installed.

Attendees get free access to the labs.
Due to limited space available, attendees need to register on this meetup event. Click that you are coming!

events.name: GDG Devfest Wrocław 2019
events.description:
[eng below]
Nowe technologie, doświadczeni prelegenci, warsztaty, inżynierowie Google!

Czy potrzeba czegoś więcej by przekonać Cię do znalezienia się na GDG Devfest Wrocław 2019? Nie przegap okazji i dołącz do nas na 2 dni pełne wiedzy i emocji.

GDG DevFests są dużymi, ogranizowanymi przez społeczność wydarzeniami mającymi miejsce na całym świecie. Skupine są na budowaniu oraz rozwoju społeczności wokół technologii Google. Pokrywają wiele tematów, takich jak Android, Firebase, Google Cloud Platform, Google Assistant, Flutter, machine learning i Web.

W 2018 roku, w konferencji GDG DevFest Wrocław uczestniczyło ponad 200 osób. Niesamowici prelegenci i prelegentki z całego świata - Polski, Niemiec, Francji, Szwajcarii, Belgii, Wielkiej Brytanii i USA - dzielili się swoim doświadczeniem i wiedzą, niektórzy spośród nich byli Googlersami czy Google Developer Expertami.

Bilety, agenda i więcej już wkrótce.

Konferencja będzie prowadzona w języku angielskim.

fb event: https://www.facebook.com/events/2358277397718895/
===================
The newest technologies, expert speakers, workshops, Google engineers!

What else would you need to enjoy GDG Devfest Wrocław 2019? Do not miss the chance and join us for 2 days full of knowledge and emotions.

GDG DevFests are large, community-run developer events happening around the globe focused on community building and learning about Google's technologies. DevFest events cover multiple product areas such as Android, Firebase, Google Cloud Platform, Google Assistant, Flutter, machine learning and Web.

Last year, in 2018, GDG DevFest Wrocław reached over 200 people. Exceptional speakers from all over the world: Poland, Germany, France, Switzerland, Belgium, United Kingdom, and USA shared their experiences and knowledge, many of them being Googlers or Google Developer Experts.

Tickets, agenda, and more coming soon.

The conference will be held in English.

fb event: https://www.facebook.com/events/2358277397718895/

events.name: Cloud OnBoard: GCP Fundamentals Series Online Learning
events.description:
Cloud OnBoard is a free online instructor-led training program that enables developers and IT professionals to expand their skill set into the cloud. Google Cloud Platform (GCP) Fundamentals brings the Google Cloud Community together for consecutive day of interactive learning and hands-on labs.

--26 March | Application Development with GCP--
Learn how to design, develop, and deploy applications using GCP services and pre-trained machine learning APIs to build secure, scalable, and intelligent cloud-native applications. For application programmers and software engineers who develop software programs in the cloud.

Registration Link:
https://cloudonair.withgoogle.com/events/apac-gcp-fundamentals-series

upcoming.name: Free Google Cloud’s online learning resources!
upcoming.description:
The Google Cloud Learning team is offering 30 days of free access to three of the Google Cloud’s online learning resources as announced on the Cloud Blog.

This is a unique opportunity to improve our skills and knowledge on Google Cloud. While we’ve been able to offer QwikLabs access in the past via our Study Jams effort, this is the first time we’re offering Pluralsight access in this way. Pluralsight brings together video instruction with the power of the hands on labs, and the Coursera offering grants access to content that is otherwise for a fee.

HOW:

Simply visit goo.gle/cloud-training and fill out the form. Within minutes you will receive the instructions from the Google Cloud team on how to redeem each of the offers you sign up for. The instructions for Coursera, Pluralsight and QwikLabs will each come as individual emails.

WHEN:

Now. This offer is only good through the month of April, 2020.
